description: [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) has collected valid email addresses including personal accounts that were subsequently used for spearphishing and other forms of social engineering.(Citation: Malwarebytes Kimsuky June 2021)(Citation: Proofpoint TA427 April 2024)
